snippet.title: Gamedev Beatdown Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on steam now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1100300/
Gamedev Beatdown is a 2D Turn based narrative game about game development coming to early access on Steam in January 2020. Be a bastion of all that's good in the games industry or crunch like there is no tomorrow. Beware though, your colleagues will fight your decisions every step of the way.

Play as a developer or a veteran in a big studio with procedural progression. Start up your very own Games Studio and make games as an Indie! Help your team make decisions – big ones, everyday ones & even some really weird ones! Disagree? Well, that’s when you pull up those sleeves and duke it out! Winner takes all and shapes what direction the game heads in!

Web: http://www.qyjo.in
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/qyjogames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/qyjogames/
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/qyjogames
